summary: Completed comprehensive testing of weight display format changes from decimal lb to 'lb and oz' format throughout Carplog-Pro app. All weight display functionality is working perfectly.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 404 instead of 200 for API root
Accepts invalid catch data without validation error
minor_issues.impact: Minor - doesn't affect weight display functionality

passed_tests: Dashboard weight stats show 'X lb Y oz' format when lb unit is selected
Dashboard weight stats show decimal kg format when kg unit is selected
Unit toggle (kg/lb) works correctly on Dashboard
Statistics page yearly summary shows 'X lb Y oz' format when lb unit is selected
Statistics page monthly breakdown shows 'X lb Y oz' format when lb unit is selected
Unit toggle (kg/lb) works correctly on Statistics page
Catch cards in All Catches view show 'X lb Y oz' format for catches stored in lb
Catch cards in All Catches view show decimal kg format for catches stored in kg
Weight display correctly converts kg values to lb/oz format in dashboard stats
Weight display correctly shows original stored format in catch cards
Add catch form accepts both kg and lb weight units
Navigation between all tabs works correctly
Backend API endpoints (auth, catches, stats) working correctly
